items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: Gemini-Clone A lightweight browser clone for the Gemini protocol, offering a minimalist, text-focused browsing experience. This project replicates the core functionality of Gemini, including basic navigation and efficient page rendering. Open-source and designed for fast, distraction-free browsing.

items.content_html: A toolkit for creating, managing, and distributing browser bookmarklets. Includes ready-to-use productivity tools, a CLI for generating bookmarklets in multiple languages, and shared runtime libraries. Enhance your browser with lightweight, portable productivity tools.
